name: The Smart Local Vietnam
tagline: Lifestyle, travel, food, & fun news from Vietnam. Written by locals, for locals.
description:
The Smart Local Vietnam recommends and places to go, things to do to local Vietnamese residents. Our writers are locals and familiar with the major cities of Vietnam, and always sharing their best finds in our articles. We also cover fun and quirky news that is usually only in Vietnamese and shut off from the English-speaking audience.

By creating high-quality hyperlocal content for our viewers, this in turn attracts advertisers who like our brand-safe and positive image. We provide a one-stop service to clients by helping to  ideate and conceptualise campaigns, creating content assets through editorial and video, and then distributing these to the relevant channels in our ecosystem. Other services include white-label content work, social media management, and ad optimisation services.
